title: Aubergine and lamb stew
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '675g lamb shoulder', '2 large aubergines, peeled and chopped', '2 large tomatoes, chopped', '2 large onions, chopped', '2 green peppers, chopped', '10 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 tablespoon tomato puree', '120ml water', '1 teaspoon allspice', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper']
